summary: Adds a shop near Morthal with a new NPC, Gunder! Gunder's Grandfather Gunder is from the Oblivion Crisis Era in Cyrodiil.  This mod extends his liniage as his great grandson has opened up shop in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Reviews-[/b][/color]

Otoky says:
[color=gold][size=5]"I found your mods this morning and i have to say: your work is impressive! I love the way you mod. You do little changes but significant for anyone who likes small but quality changes. Keep up the good work! I will add all your mods to my game"[/size][/color]

[color=Lightskyblue][b]-Description-[/b][/color]

[size=4]Heading North of Morthal you will find Colovian Traders. Gunder in Skyrim is the great grandson of Gunder from Cyrodill. Gunder has a good bit of gold for easy pawning of heavy loads.[/size]
author: yourenotsupposedtobeinhere
